# Data Cleaning Steps

1.  Participants who answered "I don't know" or "no" on the variable `TakingTrikafta` were excluded from these analyses.

```{r warning=FALSE}
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
library(gtsummary)
library(kableExtra)
library(foreign)
# Read in data
df = read.spss("/Volumes/PEDS/RI Biostatistics Core/Shared/Shared Projects/Vigers/CF/Emily Muther/Body Image and Trikafta/Data_Raw/TrikaftaBodyImage3.6.23.sav",to.data.frame = T)
# Filter
df = df %>% 
  filter(TakingTrikafta=="yes")
# Pick relevant columns
df = df %>% 
  select(ID,Age,Gender,PercentAdherence,DosesMissed,FeelTrikafta,
         DifferencesTrikafta,BMI,FEV1,Race,Ethnicity,InsuranceType,
         WeightBody_Adherence,DoNotWantTrikafta,ContinueTrikafta,
         FRS_Category,contains("BE_"),contains("PHQ9"),contains("GAD7"),
         -contains("MEAN"))
```

# Descriptive analyses

```{r}
#| label: tbl-1
#| tbl-cap: Baseline characteristics by FRS category
#| message: false
df %>% select(-ID) %>%
  tbl_summary(by = FRS_Category) %>%
  as_kable_extra(
    booktabs = TRUE,
    longtable = TRUE
  ) %>% 
  kable_styling(
    full_width = T,
    latex_options = "repeat_header"
  )
```
